2.label: Switching Command
2.description: All devices in this group will receive a BASIC SET command on Smoke Alarms. Configuration parameter 3 and 4 will define the BASIC command sent.

paramInformation.label: Value of On-Command
paramInformation.description: This value is sent as BASIC Set to Association Group 2 when an Smoke Alarm occurs.

paramInformation.label: Value of Off-Command
paramInformation.description: This value is sent as BASIC Set to Association Group 2 when an Smoke Alarm is cleared.

metadata.wakeup: A double click on the Z-Wave button wakes up the device.
metadata.inclusion: Secure Inclusion: Push the button for 3 seconds, Unsecure Inclusion: Push the button for 1 seconds
metadata.reset: To reset the device keep the button pushed for 10 seconds. After 5 seconds the led starts flashing and after another 5 seconds there is a short beep signaling the successful reset back to factory defaults.
